post.body: Yeay! Go warm up.
BTW: "TWSS" = That's what she said. :)
Playing on the computer... with my Christmas gift from @plumpita... an HP 24" LCD monitor. Holy cow this thing is huge (TWSS) and bright.
Just hit 17k (exactly) in my Gamerscore. W00t!
Picking up my Christmas present from FedEx. This place is packed.
Having lunch at Red Robin before we go see a movie... The Spirit. Waiting for @kylene (foot tapping).
Playing Lego Batman with @plumpita, gettin' achievements.
Snow finally melted enough so we could drive down our street today. Out eating a late breakfast and then grocery shopping.
http://twitpic.com/w93q - Carmenere from Chile
Playing cards and drinking wine at the in-laws.
http://twitpic.com/w6v0 - Early Christmas present. It'll be fun to drink - I may need help from my adopted little sister.
Setting up my father-in-law's 120 GB Zune for him.
Finally off the plane and closer to home. Ah, humidity. Love it.
Can't believe how many babies are on this plane. there must be 4 different infants screaming in unison.
Eating in airport b4 flight and over-hearing a redneck conversation. What adult starts a story with "When I was in elementary school..."?
Looks like I'll make it back to Seattle today. Flight is delayed, but not cancelled.
Just showed my Mom how to use Windows Photo Gallery, tags and Flickr.
Drying out in Albuquerque. There is zero moisture here, which is why they call it a desert.
http://twitpic.com/v532 - See the Seattle flight that's cancelled? That's my flight. Now I'm leaving Tuesday instead.
No offense to stupid people, but there are some stupid people on this plane. The ones totally oblivious to those around them.
